Uses of Class
edu.caltech.sbw.Module

Uses of Module in edu.caltech.sbw
 

Methods in edu.caltech.sbw that return Module
static Module SBW.getModuleInstance(java.lang.String moduleName)
          Returns an instance of the given module.
static Module[] SBW.getExistingModuleInstances()
          Returns an array of Module objects corresponding to every module connected to the system at this time.
static Module[] SBW.getExistingModuleInstances(java.lang.String name)
          Returns an array of Module objects corresponding to every running module that has the given module unique name.
static Module SBW.getThisModule()
          Returns a Module object corresponding to the current module instance.
 Module Service.getModule()
          Returns a Module class object corresponding to the module that implements this service.
 

Methods in edu.caltech.sbw with parameters of type Module
 void SBWListener.onModuleShutdown(Module module)
          This method on the listener is called every time a module instance somewhere in the SBW system disconnects from the SBW Broker.
 void SBWListener.onModuleStart(Module module)
          This method on the listener is called every time a module instance starts up or connects to the SBW Broker.
